patient_information: Age: 18 years Sex: male Country of origin: India Comorbidities: none reported Immunosuppression: none reported Vaccinations: none reported Allergies: none reported
chief_complaint: Description: noticed a pale patch on his right arm and forearm for 3 months Duration: 3 months
history_of_present_illness: Timeline: noticed the pale patch on his right arm and forearm for 3 months Key symptoms: ["reduced sensation in the affected area", "mild numbness of the little finger of the right hand", "thickened right ulnar nerve"] Severity pattern: progressive over 3 months
exposure_and_epidemiology: Travel history: recent travel to India Vector exposures: none reported Animal exposures: none reported Water food risks: none reported Contacts: none reported Season outbreak context: unknown
physical_exam: {'skin_exam': '20 cm by 10 cm hypopigmented macule on the outer aspect of the right arm extending onto the forearm', 'heent_exam': 'normal', 'chest_exam': 'normal', 'abdominal_exam': 'normal', 'neurological_exam': {'sensory_abnormalities': ['reduced sensation in the tip and ulnar border of the right little finger'], 'motor_abnormalities': None, 'reflexes': None}, 'lymph_nodes': 'normal', 'other_systems_exam': 'normal'}
differential_diagnosis: Considered conditions: ["leprosy", "vitiligo", "pityriasis alba", "seborrheic dermatitis"] Reasons for consideration: ["hypopigmented macule with reduced sensation and thickened nerve", "recent travel to India", "normal CBC, chem panel, and coagulation profile"]
